The first email was sent by support@techservices.com on May 19th, 2024, at 23:50:00, with the subject "TechServices Password Reset Request". The link to reset the password is: https://techservices.com/auth/password-reset/token=?asfbuy3y2cdaqhvei

The second email was sent by tech-services-password@aol.com on May 19th, 2024, at 23:55:00, with the subject "Your TechServices password reset request". The link to reset the password is: https://techservices.com/auth/password-reset/token=?fjahwb24jab3

Also, the second email seems suspicious as it was sent from a different email address (aol.com) than the official TechServices support email. I would recommend using the link from the first email for security reasons.
